俺と……！！\n付き合ってくれぇええええ――――！！:
With me...!!
Go out with meeeeeee!!
とっさに俺は近くにいた白奈機の手を握り、\n一世一代のＭＧでの愛の告白をぶちかま:
I immediately grabbed Shirona's hand, which was nearby.
It was a once-in-a-lifetime confession of love at MG.
……って、みんなと一緒に驚いてみたけど、\n『付き合う』って……ルート探索？:
...Wait, I was surprised along with everyone else, but...
“Going out”...? Searching for a route?
そうだ……この先ずっと、人生という名のルートを\n俺と一緒に開拓しよう。俺には、:
That's right... For the rest of my life, I'll take the route known as life.
Let's open it together. I need you... Hakuna!
あ。多分、まったく意味が伝わってないなこれ。: Ah, this probably doesn't make any sense at all.
だが、今はこれでごり押すしかないんだ。\n頼む、白奈……！ 俺の意図を察してくれ:
But right now, I have no choice but to push with this.
Please, Shirona...! Guess what I'm trying to do...!
（何故こんなところでいきなりプロポーズを……！？）: (Why did he propose to me all of a sudden?!)
（あー、そういうことか。あはは、面白いこと考えるね～）: (Ah, so that's how it is. Ahaha, what an interesting idea~)
まさか、こんなところでカップルが成立しちゃうとはね。: I didn't think we'd have a couple here.
とりあえず上手くいったか: I guess it worked out for now.
よし、さっきまでの重い空気がどこか遠くに消し飛んでくれたな。\n後はこのままふざ:
All right, the heavy atmosphere from before has vanished into the distance.
All that's left is to lighten the mood like this...!
ふぅ……では成立だな。立会人は七彩に頼むとするか。: Phew... Then it's done. Let's ask Shichika to be the witness.
落ち着け、七彩。そこで了承するのはおかしいってば！: Calm down, Shichika. It's strange for you to agree to that!
それに白奈、おまえちゃんと意味分かってる！？: And Shirona, do you understand what I'm saying!?
？ もちろん。この先、彼がわたしにずっと一緒に\n歩み続けてほしいって思っている:
? Of course. From now on, he'll be with me forever.
That means you want me to keep walking.
え、あーまあ……分かってるならいいんだけど、さ……: Uh, well... As long as you understand, that's fine, but...
えっと、えっと……わ、私、式で余興とかやりますね！\n今のうちにジャグリングとか:
Um, umm... I-I'll do some entertainment at the ceremony!
I need to practice juggling and stuff while I still can...
じゃああたしは思い出ムービーでも撮っておこうかな。: Well then, I guess I'll make a memorable movie.
ふふ、ふふふ！ もう、こんな時に何してるんですかっ！: Hehe, hehehehe! Geez, what are you doing at a time like this?!
イライラしてる自分があほらしくなって来たんだけど……: I'm starting to feel like an idiot for being so irritated...
……そうですわね。\n皆で協力こそすれ、争うだなんて論外ですわ。:
...You're right.
It's out of the question for all of us to work together and fight.
（きっと%usernameusernameuserna%さんは、\nこの場の空気:
(I'm sure %usernameusernameuserna%-san is...
He probably said something like that to change the mood here.)
（いやあ、正直今はシラフに戻りつつあるけど、\n俺もだいぶメイズシンドロームにや:
(Well, to be honest, I'm returning to being sober right now, but...)
I feel like Maze Syndrome did a lot to me, too...)
先ほどは、口が過ぎましたわ。\nみなさん、申し訳ございません。:
I spoke too much earlier.
I'm sorry, everyone.
あたしもごめんなさい。さすがにあれはなかった。\n特に、七彩ちゃんとめるちゃん…:
I'm sorry too. Of course it wasn't there.
Especially Nanaya-chan and Meguru-chan... I'm really sorry.
いえ、まったく気にしていないので……お互い様ですよ。: No, it doesn't bother me at all... It's the same for both of us.
ええ、あれはメイズシンドロームのせいですわ。: Yes, that was because of the Maze Syndrome.
ラミも、その……いろいろと言い過ぎた。ごめん。: Rami also, umm... said too much. Sorry.
わたしもなんであんなテンションだったのか、意味わからない……\n変なこと言って、:
I don't understand why I was so excited, either...
I'm sorry for saying something weird.
おいおい、俺の恋人に謝らせるだなんていいご身分だな？: Hey, hey, you're in a good position to make my lover apologize, aren't you?
おまえはどの立場から物を言ってんだよ！: From what position are you saying things?!
ラミがツッコんだ後、通信越しに笑い声が聞こえてきた。\nどうやら俺の思惑は成功し:
After Rami retorted, she heard laughter over the comms.
Looks like my plan was a success.
緊迫した状況だからこそ、リラックスすることが必要になる。\nこれで空気が変わるの:
It's precisely because of the urgency of the situation that we need to relax.
If this was going to change the mood, then messing around wasn't a bad move.
俺達の将来設計については一先ず置いておいて、だ。: Let's put our future plans aside for now.
それよりも、まずは地上への帰還方法について考えるべきだ。: More importantly, we should think of a way to return to the surface first.
回収したマップデータから、現在地は特定できている。\nだが……やはりというかなん:
Based on the map data we recovered, we've pinpointed their current location.
But... It's still extremely difficult to escape.
ふむ……なるほど。<r=ドリフト>横坑</r>と<r=ホール>広間</r>を辿っ:
Hmm... I see. Follow the <r = Drift> Drift <r> and <r=hole> Hall <r<
In any case, it seems the distance between us is too long for us to return.
弾薬も燃料もカツカツなあたし達じゃ、\n脱出する前にゲームオーバーだろうね～。:
We don't have any ammunition or fuel to spare.
It's probably game over before we get out of here.
そもそもメイズシフターと戦えるかどうかすら怪しくね？\n近接武器だけで蹂躙できる:
I don't even know if we'll be able to fight the Mazesifter in the first place, right?
They weren't the kind of opponents you could ravage with just close-range weapons.
ああ、ぶっちゃけかなり無謀でしかないと思う。\nだから、どうするべきかと悩んでい:
Yeah, to be honest, I think it's pretty reckless.
That's why I'm worried about what to do, but...
それなら、別のルートを使えばいい。: In that case, we could just use a different route.
地上に出るまでには、もうひとつ別のルートがある。\n近くに<r=メインシャフト>:
There was another route to get to the surface.
There should be an entrance to the <r=main shaft> main shaft.
あ……確かに、<r=メインシャフト>主縦坑</r>までたどり着ければ一気に地表ま: Ah... You're right. If we can get to the main shaft, we'll be able to go up to the surface all at once.
へえ、じゃあもうその<r=メインシャフト>主縦坑</r>ルートでいいじゃん。: Wow, then that <r=main shaft> main shaft route should be fine.
そう上手くいくかな？: I wonder if it'll work out that well?
<r=メインシャフト>主縦坑</r>周辺には強力なメイズシフターが生息している\:
<r=main shaft> The main shaft <r> is inhabited by powerful maise shifters.
There's a lot going on. Even if we get there, will we be able to break through safely?
安全性だけを鑑みれば<r=ドリフト>横坑</r>ルートを選ぶべきだろう。\nだが:
In terms of safety alone, we should probably choose the <r=drift> side tunnel <r> route.
However, the <r=main shaft> main shaft <r> had a lot of risk, so there was a lot to gain from it.
（あの白奈さんが、珍しく自信満々に提案した訳ですし……）: (It's rare to see Shirona-san so confident in her proposal...)
メンバー達が白奈の案に希望を見出し始めているように見える。\nやはりここは白奈の:
It looks like the members are starting to see hope in Shirona's plan.
Should I adopt Hakuna's plan after all?
（お腹空いた……早く帰りたい……）: (I'm hungry... I want to go home...)
……当の白奈は別のことを考えていそうだが。: ...The girl in question seems to be thinking about something else.
……白奈の案で行こう。俺達はこれから<r=メインシャフト>主縦坑</r>を目指す: ...Let's go with Shirona's plan. We're heading for the main shaft. Shirona, can you lead the team and scout?
任せて。与えられた役目は果たしてみせる。: Leave it to me. I'll fulfill the role I was given.
